realty.disclosure.conditions.title: AFFILIATED BUSINESS ARRANGEMENT DISCLOSURE
data:
This is to give you notice that PenFed has a business relationship with PenFed Realty, LLC d/b/a Prudential PenFed Realty, d/b/a Prudential Dinning Beard Realtors and d/b/a Prudential Texas Properties ("PenFed Realty"). PenFed Realty is wholly owned by PenFed and this referral may provide PenFed a financial or other benefit.

 

Set forth below is the estimated charge or range of charges for the settlement services listed. You are NOT required to use the listed provider(s) as a condition for the purchase, sale, or refinance of the subject property. THERE ARE FREQUENTLY OTHER SETTLEMENT SERVICE PROVIDERS AVAILABLE WITH SIMILAR SERVICES. YOU ARE FREE TO SHOP AROUND TO DETERMINE THAT YOU ARE RECEIVING THE BEST SERVICES AND THE BEST RATE FOR THESE SERVICES.

 

Provider/Settlement Service

 

PenFed Realty/Real Estate Commission

 

Charge/Range of Charges

 

Charges may range from 1% to 6% of the sales price plus $295.

 

Â© 2017 BRER Affiliates LLC. An independently owned and operated broker member of BRER Affiliates, LLC. Prudential, the Prudential logo and the Rock symbol are registered service marks of Prudential Financial, Inc. and its related entities, registered in many jurisdictions worldwide. Used under license with no other affiliation with Prudential. PenFed Membership is not required to conduct business with Prudential-PenFed Realty.
